resources.string: How long it will be taken to crack your password?
Your password is\n `One of the Most Common Passwords`\n You should probably change it.
Your password will be crack\n `Instantly`\n You should probably change it.
It would take\n %1$s\n for a Desktop PC to crack your password.
It needs more than\n `the age of the universe`\n to crack your password.
`Is This Safe?` · `Is This Accurate?` · `How It Works?` · Choosing A Secure Password
